website_summaries.verdict: If it wasn't for the HTC One V, the long-lasting Samsung Galaxy Reverb would be Virgin Mobile’s best Android smartphone.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Reverb is compact, has long battery life, Android 4.0, and packs a removable battery
cons: Clad in plastic, the Galaxy Reverb's design is far from luxurious and its lack of 4G is a letdown

website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Reverb is a solid midrange Android smartphone for Virgin Mobile, but it's a little too expensive for what you get.
cons: Price is a little too high

customer_reviews.title: great phone. but a few JB flaws.
customer_reviews.text: this is a great phone however be very aware of the jelly bean update. after this update the phone does show problems. its apparent that this is an ongoing issue for this model. if possible please stay on ice cream sandwich. (ICS ) other than that this is a great phone. and by far the best one i have owned. the only reason i rated it 4 out of 5 stars is because of the common issues with the jelly bean ( JB) update. . pros battery life. durability response cheap smart phone cons jelly bean update screen becomes unresponsive (JB problem ) random phone restarts ( JB problem )
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and really fast
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and really fast. Unfortunately Assurance Wireless doesn't use these phones for their program, so I use it to go online since the one AW sent me is mega slow!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Newhall

customer_reviews.title: Good screen action, Android OS, good smart phone for a lot less $$
customer_reviews.text: This is a good phone, good touch screen action, runs Android. I have only 5-6 "extra" apps - more than what was loaded when I received the phone - and the phone still runs well. Very good at picking up Wi-Fi networks, battery usage is significantly extended when Wi-Fi is on for facebook, gmail, etc. For a "cheap" phone (compared to other smartphones), it is meeting all my needs! I don't do a lot of streaming, so I can't comment on the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sudhoff

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and not too big
customer_reviews.text: The newest OS update makes it freeze occasionally, but hopefully that will be fixed soon. Now three of us in the family have a Reverb, and they're great. Front-facing camera is a great feature for a phone that's not very expensive. It's very stable, unlike my old Optimus V that I had to restart daily. It's not lightning-fast, but for this price it's very good. It's got a good screen size and a good chunk of internal storage space, and still easily fits in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works and was on time
customer_reviews.text: The phone was brand new, came on time at a reasonable price. It works just like it's supposed to and came with all the "what's in the box parts". My only complaint was with the delivery company who despite a phone call to the corporate distribution center, and a note on my door asking to leave it at my apartment's office so it didn't get stolen they actually hid it under my doormat. The company is a smaller one called OnTrac but I guess it did get there.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS PHONE !
customer_reviews.text: This phone must have some kind of software problem or something . it freezes up all day long. virgin replaced it with a refub ? the one they sent me was already broken when got it. they sent me a new phone and it did the samething turning off and freezing. now I am on the 4th replacement phone again refurb.? so I would say ..DONT BUY THIS PHONE !! do yourself a favor and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: The one quirk is the worst one to have
customer_reviews.text: I have to do a battery pull on the phone daily, sometimes multiple times a day, because the screen completely stops working. I can run my finger over it, and nothing happens. I can use the power button to put the screen to sleep then try again, and still nothing happens. The absolute only way to get the screen to work again is to pull the battery.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gladson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Blackberry Curve user for a number of years but decided to try an Android phone with a touch screen. The Samsung Galaxy S4 was too expensive so I thought I'd try the Reverb. So far I've been pretty happy with this phone although I do find it more difficult to text than on a QWERTY keyboard. Long battery life, great display, excellent performance.
customer_reviews.author: msonherown

customer_reviews.title: Such a great phone
customer_reviews.text: I have so issues with the screening locking up, but I just take out the battery and it works perfectly again. No other issues, though. Camera is fantastic, call quality is great and I love the look/style of the phone. Plus I got it at a great discount so that was wonderful! I highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bacher

customer_reviews.title: couldnt be hooked to my family members virgin mobile paylo ...
customer_reviews.text: couldnt be hooked to my family members virgin mobile paylo account and also could not be used for just the camera when adding pics to online selling. the phone was made so the camera could only be used if the cell had minutes. so this phone is on a shelf somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: avs

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on of these for a teenager... She loved the features of the phone, but the hardware was so buggy that I had to return it. The screen continuously froze requiring a reboot for the phone to become functional again. Also the power button got stuck causing it to reboot over and over again. I thought it was a defective unit so I worked with Amazon and exchanged it for a new one. The new one had EXACTLY the same problems. Then I read reviews on the Virgin Mobile site and found tons of reviews with people complaining of the same kind of problems ....
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I switched from AT&T to virgin and went from a Blackberry curve to this.I love the Android system it's fast and easy to use.I have had no problems at all with the phone.I will say that activating it was a little frustrating but once I got through that no problems.If you get this phone be sure to go into your settings and make sure the power save option is on because the screen on this will drain your battery pretty fast as with all smart phones with a large screen.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, but defective
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for only a month, and it's already started shutting off and turning back on by itself at least once a day, usually more. One time it did it seven times in a row. Other than this problem, the phone is great. It wouldn't be such a problem if it didn't turn off when I was doing things on it like texting or calling. It also turns off randomly when I'm in class or interviews, and since it's not on silent the sound it makes when it turns on are quite annoying. Definitely disappointed in the defective qualities of this great and new phone.
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: It was useless to me, but that's just me...
customer_reviews.text: It did not have a calendar reminder alarm. Other than making phone calls, this is the most important thing that I need in a mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UNTIL JELLYBEAN UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: this phone is perfect until you update it to jellybean 4.1.2 DO NOT UPDATE the phone FREEZES ALOT and if your a fan of wifi tethering THE UPDATE DISABLES IT you can't Tether on any app UNLESS YOU ROOT IT other wise wifi Tethering is over Foxfi, pdanet, tetherfy, and ALL OTHER tethering apps ARE BROKEN and also if you update it THERE'S NO WAY TO ROOT IT so KEEP 4.0 ICS OS AND CHARISH IT don't make the same mistake i did
customer_reviews.author: Jahmir Ahmmad Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Theres a reason why this phone is on sale. It has a freezing problem. Do reviews, you'll see it all over the internet of the same complaint. Only wish I reviewed harder before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Super phone, super service
customer_reviews.text: Switched from another pre-paid cellular service provider from which we had a "dumb" phone. The Samsung Galaxy Reverb has all of the features that we desired, plus more. It has plenty of memory, a good processor, and the Android market provides plenty of usable apps. While the phone was somewhat of a challenge to activate, one call to Virgin Mobile quickly solved the problem, and the service over the Sprint network has been flawless. We liked the phone so much that we purchased another one to replace another smartphone receiving service from a contract plan.
customer_reviews.author: G E B

customer_reviews.title: pretty good phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is pretty good, the camera is really good it has a nice clarity in the photos. It's also has a quick processor when using the internet.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: This phone sucks, memory wise
customer_reviews.text: This phone sucks, memory wise. After reaching memory capacity it's very sluggish. Will not purchase this phone ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Gems_N_Holos

customer_reviews.title: I love my phone
customer_reviews.text: I waited a month to see how I would like using my phone after the newness wore off. I upgraded from the Samsung Intercept, and I love my Galayx Reverb! It is so much faster and easier to use. It does everything I want it to do, and does it right away. No more long picture uploads to facebook...what once took over a minute on my Intercept takes just a few seconds on my Reverb. I am so happy I made the switch!
customer_reviews.author: Julia L. Wysocki

customer_reviews.title: super
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this phone for a few months now, and it works just fine. Got an automatic update to 4.1.2 when i turned it on. Havent had any issues at all. Worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: samsung reverb
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter smart phone, its reasonably priced and has a lot of features. It does seem a little fragile so get a good cover to protect it from damage.
customer_reviews.author: JJP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this phone upgraded from an LG Optimus. So far it's working fine. I had to uninstall Skype from it though..kept freezing my phone but I think it's more of a skype issue than an issue with the phone itself.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for a prepaid service!
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone for what is used for as prepaid. Slim and stylish. Signal though is not that great when used indoor (maybe from cell provider). Fast and has full web capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: AKF312

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Ok it is a good price but I live in a trailer and it has one bar and when out side it two or three and it sad it wood work in my ary
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: nice phone upgrade
customer_reviews.text: good middle of the road phone.it's reasonably fast, considering its a single-core processor. Only minor complaints 1 is that its casing is smooth and makes a fairly slippery,the power button seems to get a little sticky and wants to shut off and turn on. It has good battery life, it has a nice camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and service without contract.
customer_reviews.text: I took this opportunity to change providers while stepping up to smartphone technology. Virgin Mobile is as good as my previous service and for a lower cost I am able to go from a voice & text flip phone to this beautiful 3G large screen Samsung Galaxy Reverb. Nice to not need a contract anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: REMARKABLY UNREMARKABLE
customer_reviews.text: this phone was a downgrade from my htc evo 4g 3d...only got it due to loss and theft of two previous evos...this was all i could afford. also, sometimes the touchscreen will just stop responding to touch and the only way to fix it is to pry open the back and pop out the battery...wait , put it back together and wait some more for the whole thing to reboot. bleh
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The Samsung Galaxy Reverb smart phone is just a really great phone
customer_reviews.text: HELLO, The Samsung Galaxy Reverb smart phone is just a really great phone. I recommend it to you. Yours, Dr. Elyas F. Isaacs
customer_reviews.author: Dr. ELYAS F.ISAACS; PHD, PHD, DPH, DDiv., MD [CC/PH]

customer_reviews.title: This phone is junk. Doesn't have enough ram to ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is junk. Doesn't have enough ram to operate apps efficiently. Five to ten second delay on commands, very irritating
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought phone April of 2013, stopped working April of 2015. Started having issues after the 1st year, it kept freezing up, touchwizard wouldn't work properly, had to keep shutting it down and turning back on . Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle, Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Reverb
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my 15 year old son....he loves it!!! It was a replacement for the LG Rumor Touch.. Talk about upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice compact phone with good size screen. Nice smooth interface. My wife really likes it. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: joeycn

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: My wife has the Optimus slider, which is still a popluar prepaid phone. Very nice upgrade though. Android 4.0 is much faster than 2.3. Would definitely recommend for prepaid :)
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Gaxaxy Reverb
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone. I still do not know all what it does but I am having fun finding out. This is my first smartphone and it defintely will not be my last. I plan to upgrade to a bigger screen and I hope Samsung will have come out with a new Galaxy phone next year or the year after next. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: wife's phon
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my wife. Decent service from Virgin, but the 3g is pitiful slow. phone hangs up a lot requiring restart. numerous fails on touchscreen working.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lifer

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same phone for about three years and it has been getting slower and slower. This one arrived today and I had it set up and going within a half hour. I am excited to find out all the things it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Terrisa

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: I like this much better than my previous LG Optimus for Virgin Mobile. Good Battery life. It doesn't run too hot. Over all pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Think-a-Lot

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Reverb
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a upgrade from my previous Virgin Mobile phone. I love all the features it has. The only problem I have with the phone is that sometimes it will freeze and the screen will become unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is poor
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone overall but they really need to make a phone that has a battery that at least can make it through the day. I don't even use it much throughout the day but when I got home from work I'd need to charge it again. With Samsung it seems as though you need to spend the big bucks and buy their higher models to get what you need. My other complaint is the camera. It's super slow to open so I miss good shots. Also the lag time between shots is far too long
customer_reviews.author: TrustedBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and works great for the price and what I'm using it for. Quality is good and so is the look.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: a decent phone
customer_reviews.text: this is a decent phone but i've been spoiled by the HTC evo 4g 3d--for a few bucks more I would go with the latter.
customer_reviews.author: vincenzo giacalone

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone since I eliminated the Lock Screen!
customer_reviews.text: I changed the Lock Screen Setting to None and the problem with the update was gone. I found the Lock Screen annoying anyway and was happy to eliminate an unnecessary step in using my phone. Now it always homes in on the Home screen and the update works fine! Now I really love this phone!
customer_reviews.author: SocraticMethod

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this phone it has a great screen and takes beautiful quality pictures.arrived just before her birthday thank you
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great, I've had it for just over a month now and the only issue is it tends to freeze up after it did an Android software upgrade. I just reboot it by removing and reinstalling the battery and then it's fine. Other than that it works like a charm. This is my second android platform phone. I recommend it as a great mid-upper entry level phone. Lots of great features and options to personalize.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Strassner

customer_reviews.title: Its a good phone, but it will become a pain in the ass
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a wonderfull phone, but it will turn off pretty often without any reason. I bought it 6 month ago, and now it aint working well at all. People who call me barely hear me.. Its a pain in the ass can
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: ... to switch to something new but this is a great phone and will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for over a year had to switch to something new but this is a great phone and will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: JNUMBA10

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The phone is really good overall, nice camera that does not take forever to take a picture and nice expansive phone to do whatever you need. Not sure if it was just my phone or not but mine freezes up sometimes or there will be some glitches with the texting but overall it's a great phone. Got it fast with shipping and took only 3 minutes to set it up on the network. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kim

customer_reviews.title: Phone gets really hot!
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the phone and it is easy to learn how it works. The negative experience I had it was the the fact that the phone got hot when in use and I had to returned it for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Mercado de Wails

customer_reviews.title: The cpu and storage could have been better for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent phone. The cpu and storage could have been better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: qpierce

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone for its price it has so many things alike with the Samsung galaxy S3 like touch whizz build and even lock screen I would recommend this phone by far
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Problems already
customer_reviews.text: The phone has some really nice features but I have only had it for 3wks now and it is overheating. What's up with that? The battery also dies quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning it and getting used to it, but I am really loving it so far. This is my first ever actual android phone and I have had no issues with it outside of just learning it and getting used to it. For what I use it for, it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sieker

customer_reviews.title: AHHHHH!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is nice, very lite. I am not unhappy with it but I have been having problems with this phone switching back and forth, by itself, from screen to screen(photo gallery to contacts to home screen and back to photo gallery) when I am trying to text or make a call. If thte phone would not do that, it would be a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: not a bad phone
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung galaxy reverb is a hood phone for the money. Its not the s3 but if ur looking for a good smart phone w the Samsung set up... I defiantly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: taby

customer_reviews.title: well.....
customer_reviews.text: It took 4ever to come in. Also my battery wont charge now. Not sure why... but its a great picture phone has pretty good storage space. So its a 3
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Reverb Prepaid Android Phone (Virgin Mobile)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this excellent pre-paid phone for my son and he love it. Real nice android phone, and like Virgin Mobile, pretty good services.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: very good phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: excellent phone for the price. I use for email and talk. Have had no problems with this phone and the screen is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Guaderrama

customer_reviews.title: battery
customer_reviews.text: battery stop in a week not happy about it is it any thing you can do about it i hope so..
customer_reviews.author: RICKY SELES

customer_reviews.title: its like WTH?!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is hard to type with. 1st day I got it, it turned off by itself, it just keeps messing up.
customer_reviews.author: Enrico

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Since I've used it in about the three weeks it has locked about every other day or applications shut down for no reason. The wifi function comes on with out permission sucking down the battery. I'm going to get it replaced or money back its worse than the cheap phone I used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Edward/Gina Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Virgin mobile
customer_reviews.text: My sons loves the phone. We have 5 other lines with verizon and didnt want to switch to the share everything plan, so gave virgin mobile a try. Phone has been working great for the 1st week he has used it. Great reception even in the small town in AZ that we live in. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D.

customer_reviews.title: Constantly drops calls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone three weeks ago and have yet to have a full phone conversation without my calls being dropped. I've also had trouble with the touch screen not reacting so have had to open it up and take out the battery to replace. I'm returning it today. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it except for the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone, I'm just not real crazy about the keyboard function. No matter how many times I'm trying to type a word, the wrong letters pop up....Other than that I really love the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A Keyser

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: My wires first smart phone! and for the price she is MORE than happy, its areal galaxy that does it all
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Other than when it randomly re-starts, is has been a great first phone for my eleven year-old twins. Good Value.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Its Okay
customer_reviews.text: The seller I bought it from failed to mention the scratched screen and internal damage done to the system. Id imagine the phone is quite nice, but mine has a way to many performance issues that I can not look past. In general though I feel like the phone itself is a good replacement of the more popular Galaxy SIII, Its cheaper and a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: does everything!
customer_reviews.text: I like it!! Takes a min to get use too the touch screen. Has all the bells and whistles and takes great pictures. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim M. Horton

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: still reading the manual as this is my first smart phone... i am looking forward to using it to it's full potential
customer_reviews.author: jim gilman

customer_reviews.title: bad experience with this phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone and I had to send it back because I couldn't activated it. Something was wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: HILDA

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the galaxy reverb on the 11th, paid for fast delivery and got it on the 13th. I am satisfied with the quick delivery and the phone. It is like a mini GALAXY for those who may not be able to afford the latest model.
customer_reviews.author: Big Sexy

customer_reviews.title: New, no chips or cracks
customer_reviews.text: Worked fast, came in the box, no chips or cracks. Also came with product details in information on how to work the phone. Was shipped in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: keisha

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, but just am not a SAMSUNG person
customer_reviews.text: I think the phone itself is great, its just not for me. Came perfect timing and everything. Just more of an LG person.
customer_reviews.author: CathyA

customer_reviews.title: Still loving this phone after several years
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Samsung Galaxy Reverb phone to purchase for myself and family - it is a great phone. The first one I purchased in 2013 and it is still working like a jewel. Actually, it spoils one when trying other brands. It has a very clear, bright screen - which makes graphics appear nicely. The camera produces nice photos as well. The App capability is wondeful for doing my online banking, emails, travel reservations, etc. Overall, we are very pleased with the design and functions. Many thanks to Samsung for a great yet affordable device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long battery and Fast CPU
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the LG Optimus Elite and I have to say I find this phone much better. It is about the same size as the Elite but with a larger screen and front facing camera. The speakers are louder and looks sleeker than the Elite, since it only has three buttons and a curved bottom. The OS is much more intuitive and has several more setting variations available. The internet connection is much better and that is I'm assuming from the CPU and ROM capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: shark.attack

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Okay
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone because of the on board space available. However, you cannot actively put apps on the SD card, the screen has a tendency to simply stop working and it seems to get really laggy at times. When the touch screen simply stops working, the only fix I have found it to disassemble the phone (pull the battery). If this didn't happen as frequently as it does, I would rate it higher. I do enjoy the wide variety of apps this phone allows me to use over my old phone.
customer_reviews.author: Baelabog

customer_reviews.title: i hate this phone
customer_reviews.text: the phone is very slow, has small amount of memory and responds in a very quirky way, sometimes it won't read your touch then other times it will exaggerate the touch and scroll all the way down. It froze on me almost daily until I downloaded a clean master and that prevented it from happening as often, I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Love it, live with it, and look forward to the next in line! This Samsung Galaxy Reverb has successfully taken this ol' dinosaur into the modern era, with easy texting, sharing photos, etc. I recommend adding the SanDisk Ultra 32GB MicroSDHC Class 10 UHS Memory Card as well. Good luck & enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: FYI

customer_reviews.title: For the price not bad
customer_reviews.text: We'll a upgrade compared to most of all other virgin mobiles phones. Not much to say it works and depending on your location apps like YouTube should work. It's a 50/50 chance. Can play big games on it and great pictures. A lil low in volume when you call or get called. Not too buggy. Nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Root this phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great! The price is great, the feel is great, but all the cases are s***. Anyways, root this phone, and you'll really feel like you're holding a galaxy S3 mini in your hand!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Does it job with no problems
customer_reviews.text: It meets my needs well. It is not the fastest latest phone but it functions well for a light to moderate user. It is easy to learn to use and does most everything a smart phone should do. I have been using the phone for over a year with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Freeze
customer_reviews.text: That's what they should call this phone because that's all it does well. I have had it for a few months and I think I've had 2 days when it didn't freeze up. I am gonna have to bite the bullet and spend some real money on a phone because you do get what you pay for in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this phone or service
customer_reviews.text: The phone runs very slow its very frustrating to do ANYTHING on this phone . The service is not the greatest either it drops my calls. Ive had it Since July 2013 in hopes there would be some updates to make it run better the only thing ive noticed is that it does not lock up on lock screen anymore . I would not recommend this phone to anyone keep on looking for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Libby

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time with this phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for under a year and its plagued with random issues here and there. It still works but there is always some kind of issue. There's always a lag in response to doing anything. Started out great, then flaked out after adding a nominal amount of apps (still plenty of memory open, so it says). My GF has the Galaxy SIII, different class of phone (also VM).
customer_reviews.author: Samir Parikh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Lags, not very responsive, kind of slow, and infact I have installed just a few apps and even when i m constantly optimizing the memory. Battery doesnt hold up for long.
customer_reviews.author: Ivailo Georgiev

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the first phone that I have had in a long time that I really like. Not too fancy, does what I need, holds a charge which is important to me... has all the android apps that I need... I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbe Noonan

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T MOVE APPS TO SD CARD
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that apps could not be moved from the phone to the SD card. What is the SD card there for then??????????????????? 2gb of my phone memory was used up very quickly and I spent hours on the problem. Probably moving on to another phone.
customer_reviews.author: dallasite14

customer_reviews.title: not so great!!
customer_reviews.text: Galaxy's....not so great!!! It's the phone...it drops most calls....have switched phones and all is so much better now...same carrier. I just don't understand
customer_reviews.author: Lori 1967

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: definite step up from Optimus V, fast and reliable. only thing I am annoyed with is, Samsung essentials pack wanting to constantly install, which will change my current settings, eventhough i say never install.
customer_reviews.author: TyMasters

customer_reviews.title: new phone
customer_reviews.text: I have only had my Samsung galaxy reverb for a week, but I loved it. It is way bigger than my old blackberry curve phone I had it for three years. I love the screen size and how vivid the pictures that I take turn out. The only thing is that my phone keeps beeping every hour. I don't know why. It is definitely an upgrade from my old phone. I hope it keeps working great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Myles

customer_reviews.title: It's old, but it is smooth!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is horrible (to use in late 2017), but this is not the phone's fault, it is mine for not researching the specs.
customer_reviews.author: JERUSHAX

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Like at all
customer_reviews.text: Switched (upgraded ) so I thought , from optimus elite to this galaxy reverb, I used the reverb for 2 months and then switched back to optimus elite . I dont know if I got a lemon (Reverb) but I have nothing good at all to say about it. Horrible !!!
customer_reviews.author: eceltic

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this phone.
customer_reviews.text: I HATED this phone! I had it replaced 3 times under warranty and it still was so slow, I couldn't make calls or text. I had zero extra apps on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Sikma

customer_reviews.title: Blah phone and more blah network!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was not user friendly and waaayyy too quiet. Worse, Virgin Mobile was just a nightmare for me. The network was so terrible that it was basically not functional.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: My first 'smart phone' and I really liked it until it died after just one year
customer_reviews.text: My first 'smart phone' and I really liked it until it died after just one year. It became a brick and could not be revived, had to buy another phone.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Device For The Budget Consumer
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to pay a lot of money to get a great smart phone and the Samsung Galaxy Reverb proves it. This device is highly reliable and does absolutely everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ramen Noodles

customer_reviews.title: virgin mobile
customer_reviews.text: brand new factory sealed..i'm still learning how to use this phone..so far so good..will definatley buy this phone again..great service from the company
customer_reviews.author: Sp

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Phone could not be activated,, I believe because it is 3g, not 4g... Not of any use
customer_reviews.author: Patty Briar

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was horrible from day one, screen blinks at random times for no reason, freezes all the time, you touch on an item and it takes forever to actually come up on screen!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: love my new phone
customer_reviews.text: After having my last phone for more than 3 years, it was time to upgrade and replace it. So I did alot of research...and picked this phone. And I love it. I do have my drawbacks...like my fingers are seemingly to big sometimes to type on the onscreen keyboard, and it took a little bit to figure out the power options...but I would not trade it for the world right now. I can get almost two whole days with one charge, and I found the microphone option if I am having a particularily difficult day typing. I love the camera, and some of the other options, such as getting the weather alerts on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: reflectdawn

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Reverb M950 Android - Virgin Mobile
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box
